enWisdom: Acquisitions are a spring of sorrows
The fruit of acquisitions is sorrow
To the extent of [one’s] acquisitions, sorrow and grief is multiplied
To the extent of [one’s material] acquisition, there are heartaches
Wealth is the cause of trials and the plunder of calamities
Wealth is the inviter of difficulty and the riding mount of hardship

Wisdom: دِرْهَمٌ يَنْفَعُ خَيْرٌ مِنْ دِينَارٍ يَصْرَعُ
enWisdom: A dirham that benefits [others] is better than a dinar that throws one into ruin
Many a person is envied [by others] for something which is [actually] his affliction
Many a blessed person is gradually being driven [towards punishment] by those blessings
Embarking on the terrifying [and surmounting one’s fears] brings wealth

Wisdom: صَاحِبُ الْمَالِ مَتْعُوبٌ وَالْغَالِبُ بِالشَّرِّ مَغْلُوبٌ
enWisdom: The owner of wealth is faces difficulty and one who gains victory through evil [means] has [actually] been defeated

Wisdom: عَلَى قَدْرِ النَّعْمَاءِ يَكُونُ مَضَضُ الْبَلَاءِ
enWisdom: The distress of tribulation [one faces] is proportionate to the blessings [one receives]
Whoever embarks on the frightful [and risky] earns wealth

Wisdom: لَا تَأْمَنْ مِنَ الْبَلَاءِ فِي أَمْنِكَ وَرَخَائِكَ
enWisdom: Do not consider yourself secure from tribulation in your times of safety and comfort
How many a person is tested with blessings!
